aka: The Lost Boys of La Belle Etoile
this_title: Les Oubliés de la Belle Étoile
trans_title: 被遗忘的贝莱埃杜瓦受害者
The Lost Boys of La Belle Etoile
introduction: André, Daniel and Michel were physically and emotionally abused as children in a Catholic institution. Clémence Davigo documents their process of coming to terms with the past and the demands for compensation and recognition in carefully chosen camera perspectives and sensitive montage. We see how the three men face their past and how much their friendship helps them to do so - while the institutions fail to provide real support or to make amends.源自：https://www.kasselerdokfest.de/en/screenings/s-d3755a69-d12d-9243-a0c2-8cb372d54dee
chinese_title: 被遗忘的贝莱埃杜瓦受害者
foreign_title: Les Oubliés de la Belle Étoile
